summary: The module contains automated unit tests that exercise the H.264 video codec integration, including parsing of RTP payload descriptors, handling of fragmented and aggregated NAL units, and end-to-end encoding/decoding pipelines. It provides test contexts for fragmented data, validates descriptor edge cases, and checks bitrate, frame ordering, and bitstream splitting across various resolutions.
business_intent: Ensure that the H.264 codec implementation complies with RTP standards and works reliably in real-time communication scenarios, preventing regressions and guaranteeing correct video packetization, transmission, and reconstruction.
